passive.name: Dauntless Leader
passive.description:
Elesis passively possesses the abilities **Leader's Qualities** and **Berserker**.

**[Leader's Qualities]**
When using skills, Elesis will continue to increase allies' stats. Allies' basic attack speed/attack damage increases by 3%. (Maximum 30%) When skill maximization occurs, for 10 seconds allies' basic attack speed increases by 100%.

**[Berserker]**
When Elesis dies, she will gain 'Berserker' status. For 3 seconds, she will be invincible and recover 20% of her HP and reset her cooldowns. (40s cooldown)
(Recovers up to a maximum of 24% of Elesis's total attack power)

lb_passive.description:
Elesis passively possesses the abilities **Leader's Qualities** and **Berserker**.

**[Leader's Qualities]**
When using skills, Elesis will continue to increase allies' stats. Allies' basic attack speed/attack damage increases by 4.5%. (Maximum 36%, effect cannot be dispelled) When skill maximization occurs, for 10 seconds allies' basic attack speed increases by 100%. The first skill used after the battle starts will be maximized.

**[Berserker]**
When Elesis dies, she will gain 'Berserker' status. For 3 seconds, she will be invincible and recover 20% of her HP and reset her cooldowns. (40s cooldown)
(Recovers up to a maximum of 24% of Elesis's total attack power)

skill_1.name: Critical X
skill_1.description: Throw sword energy towards the targeted location and enemies within the path will be dealt 123% of physical attack damage and after leaping into the air strike down to deal 344.4% of physical attack damage along with cancelling the enemy's attack.

lb_skill_1.description:
Throw sword energy towards the targeted location and enemies within the path will be dealt 147.6% of physical attack damage and after leaping into the air strike down to deal 369% of physical attack damage along with cancelling the enemy's attack.

Enemies attacked receive 30% more damage for 10 seconds.

skill_2.name: Mega Slash
skill_2.description: After Elesis creates a shield for herserlf (30% of maximum health) that lasts for 8 seconds, she will jump into the fight and attack the enemies by slashing them consecutively to deal 252% of physical attack damage and then she will gather the enemies.

lb_skill_2.description: After Elesis creates a shield for the party (30% of Elesis' maximum health) that lasts for 8 seconds, she will jump into the fight and attack the enemies by slashing them consecutively to deal 396% of physical attack damage and then she will gather the enemies. Enemies gathered will have their attacks cancelled.

ultimate.name: End of Heart
ultimate.description:
Rushes towards the designated point and unleashes a series of consecutive slashes, dealing 559.7% physical damage to all enemies in the area and stuns them for 5s.
Afterwards, increases the attack speed of all party members by 100% for 10s.

passive.name: Bow of Innadril
passive.description:
Using a basic attack will leave **'Innadril's Soul'** and **'Innadril's Mark'** to an enemy.

**[Innadril's Soul Explosion]**
When an enemy has 5 stacks of Innadril's Soul, the spirits will explode and deal up to 12% of enemy's HP. (HP based damage can deal up to a maximum of 14.4% of Lire's total attack power)
After the explosion Lire will fire 2 arrows at a time during her basic attack for 5 seconds. (Each arrow will deal 35% of Physical Attack)

**[Innadril's Mark]**
Damage taken from Lire increased by 2% per stack. (Max 20%)

lb_passive.description:
Using a basic attack will leave **'Innadril's Soul'** and **'Innadril's Mark'** to an enemy.

**[Innadril's Soul Explosion]**
When an enemy has 5 stacks of Innadril's Soul, the spirits will explode and deal up to 15% of enemy's HP. There is a 10% chance that the stacks of **'Innadril’s Soul'** will not be consumed, but instead reduced to 4 stacks. (HP based damage can deal up to a maximum of 18% of Lire's total attack power)
After the explosion Lire will fire 2 arrows at a time during her basic attack for 5 seconds. (Each arrow will deal 35% of Physical Attack)

**[Innadril's Mark]**
Damage taken from Lire increased by 2% per stack. (Max 20%)

skill_1.name: Rapid Shot
skill_1.description:
Lire attacks using penetrating arrows to deal 246% of physical attack damage and has a 50% chance to apply **'Innadril's Soul'** on the enemy.

**[Additional Effect]**
When attacking with Rapid Shot, the arrows that have been waiting on standby in **'Elf's Space'** will fly towards the targeted location to deal additional attacks on the enemy for 147.6% of physical attack damage.

lb_skill_1.description:
Lire attacks a target using penetrating arrows to deal 369.4% of physical attack damage and has a 50% chance to apply **'Innadril's Soul'** on the enemy.

**[Additional Effect]**
When attacking with Rapid Shot, the arrows that have been waiting on standby in **'Elf's Space'** will fly towards the targeted location to deal additional attacks on the enemy for 280.3% of physical attack damage.

skill_2.name: Rain Arrow
skill_2.description:
Lire fires very many arrows towards the targeted area that fall like rain on top of the enemies and deal 209.1% of physical attack damage. It also has a 50% chance to apply **'Innadril's Soul'** to the enemy. For 8 seconds within the area where the arrows fell, an **'Elf's Space'** is created.

**[Elf's Space]**
Enemies within **'Elf's Space'** will have their movement speed reduced by 100% which then slowly recovers. The arrows within the space do not disappear, but standby for Lire's next command.

lb_skill_2.description:
Lire fires very many arrows towards the targeted area that fall like rain on top of the enemies and deal 246% of physical attack damage. It also has a 50% chance to apply **'Innadril's Soul'** to the enemy. For 15 seconds within the area where the arrows fell, an **'Elf's Space'** is created.

**[Elf's Space]**
Enemies within **'Elf's Space'** will have their movement speed reduced by 100% which then slowly recovers. Enemies within **'Elf's Space'** gain one stack of **'Innadril's Soul'** per second. The arrows within the space do not disappear, but standby for Lire's next command.

ultimate.name: Big Shot
ultimate.description: Fires a massive arrow at the targeted enemy, dealing 2,184% physical damage. The penetrating arrow deals 560% physical damage to all enemies in its path.

passive.name: Shock Wave Pulse
passive.description: Attacking an enemy slowed down by **'Blizzard Storm'** will have a 15% chance to activate a lightning magic that deals 180% of magic attack. (Damage instaces from 'Blizzard Storm' cannot generate 'Shock Wave Pulse')

lb_passive.description: Attacking an enemy slowed down by **'Blizzard Storm'** will have a 15% chance to activate a lightning magic that deals 180% of magic attack. The magic can spread to a maximum of 4 other enemies. (Damage instaces from 'Blizzard Storm' cannot generate 'Shock Wave Pulse')

skill_1.name: Meteor
skill_1.description: In a wide range, Arme summons a giant meteor to deal 418.2% of magic attack damage and for 5 seconds, the enemies will burn and be dealt up to 111.6% of maximum magic attack damage over time.

lb_skill_1.description:
In a wide range, Arme summons a giant meteor to deal 418.2% of magic attack damage and for 5 seconds, the enemies will burn and be dealt up to 111.6% of maximum magic attack damage over time.

Attacks that deal critical damage have their damage increased by 2.3x.

skill_2.name: Blizzard Storm
skill_2.description: In the targeted location, Arme will cause a blizzard that will deal up to 120% of maximum magic attack damage over time for 10 seconds. Enemies enveloped by the blizzard will have their movement/attack speed reduced up to 80% and the basic/skill attack damage they receive will increase by 30%.

lb_skill_2.description:
In the targeted location, Arme will cause a blizzard that will deal up to 120% of maximum magic attack damage over time for 10 seconds. Enemies enveloped by the blizzard will have their movement/attack speed reduced up to 80% and the basic/skill attack damage they receive will increase by 30%.

When enemies have 8 or more stacks of Frostbite, each attack from Blizzard Storm has a 20% chance of inflicting Frozen status for 3 seconds. Enemies who are frozen cannot act.

ultimate.name: Planet Impact
ultimate.description: Calls down a meteor from the atmosphere, dealing 1,470% magical damage to enemies caught in the impact.

passive.name: Assassin's Instinct
passive.description: Whenever a basic or a skill attack lands a critical, party members will have their critical rate increased by 20% for 10 seconds. After 4 basic attacks, Lass will attack enemies with 3 consecutive strikes, marking them with **'Assassin's Mark'** for 8 seconds.

lb_passive.description: Whenever a basic or a skill attack lands a critical, party members will have their critical rate increased by 20% for 10 seconds. After 4 basic attacks, Lass will attack enemies with 3 consecutive strikes, marking them with **'Assassin's Mark'** for 8 seconds. Enemies marked with **'Assassin's Mark'** via basic or skill attacks receive 25% physical attack damage every second.

skill_1.name: Rage Cutter
skill_1.description:
Quickly charges towards the designated direction, gathering enemies. Enemies attacked receive 120% physical attack damage and are marked with **'Assassin's Mark'** for 8 seconds.

**[Additional Effect]**
Lass will receive 70% less basic attack damage from enemies for 7 seconds.

lb_skill_1.description:
Lass will receive 70% less basic attack damage from enemies for 7 seconds, and quickly charges towards the designated direction, gathering enemies. Enemies attacked receive 120% physical attack damage and are marked with **'Assassin's Mark'** for 8 seconds. Subsequently, **'Fatal Fury'** will be available for use once with 0 SP within 7 seconds.

**[Fatal Fury]**
Cut down 1 enemy with blinding speed, dealing 260% physical attack damage. There is a 25% chance the attack will be strengthened to deal 924% physical attack damage.

skill_2.name: Giga Slash
skill_2.description:
After jumping to the designated location, fire sword energy at enemies dealing 295.2% physical attack damage. Enemies marked with **'Assassin's Mark'** receive 1.5 times more damage. When conditions are met, **'[Enhanced] Gigaslash'** can be used once more with 0 SP within 5 seconds.

**[Conditions for Additional Cast]**
There is a 20% chance the skill will be available for reuse.
If [Enhanced] Gigaslash lands a critical, the skill has a 100% chance to be reused.

lb_skill_2.description:
After jumping to the designated location, fire sword energy at enemies dealing 295.2% physical attack damage. Enemies marked with **'Assassin's Mark'** receive 1.5 times more damage. When conditions are met, **'[Enhanced] Gigaslash'** can be used once more with 0 SP within 5 seconds. If **'[Enhanced] Gigaslash'** lands a critical on a summon, the summon will be removed.

**[Conditions for Additional Cast]**
There is a 20% chance the skill will be available for reuse.
If [Enhanced] Gigaslash lands a critical, the skill has a 100% chance to be reused.

ultimate.name: Phantom Blade
ultimate.description: Brutalizes all enemies in the designated area with supersonic slashes, dealing 392% physical damage. Struck enemies take 35% increased damage for 15s.

passive.name: Resurrection
passive.description:
Enters invulnerable state upon taking lethal damage and recovers up to 40% health. (180s cooldown)
(Healing effect can only recover up to 16.08% of Ryam's total attack power per tick)

lb_passive.description:
Receives the following effect upon taking lethal damage.

**[Enhanced Resurrection Activation Effect]**
Enters invulnerable state for 4s.
Immediately transforms and applies protective link on allies.
Deals 15% of maximum health as damage to nearby enemies.
(Health based damage can deal up to 18% of Ryan's total attack power)

Recovers up to 60% health and the entire party receives a continuous cleanse effect for 8s. (180s cooldown)
(Healing effect can only recover up to 14.4% of Ryam's total attack power per tick)

skill_1.name: Nature Punish
skill_1.description:
Charges towards enemies, dealing 120% of physical damage and provoking them for 3s. Transforms into **Nature's Warden** for 15s upon performing the charge.
Enters invulnerable state for 2s and applies a protective link on allies for 15s, taking 60% of the damage taken in their stead.
The protective link does not apply to **summons**.

**[Transform Effect]**
Immune to all negative status and damage taken is reduced by 50%.
Recovers 3% of maximum health per second (increases the value by 1% per allies linked).
(Healing effect can only recover up to 3.6% of Ryan's total attack power per tick)

lb_skill_1.description:
Charges towards enemies, dealing 120% of physical damage and provoking them for 3s. Transforms into **Magnus Dan** for 18s upon performing the charge.
Enters invulnerable state for 2s and applies a protective link on allies for 18s, taking 60% of the damage taken in their stead.
The protective link does not apply to **summons**.

**[Transform Effect]**
Ability to cast Binding Cross skill while transformed.
Generates shield equivalent to 35% of Ryan's maximum health on all party members for 18s.
Immune to all negative status and damage taken is reduced by 50%.
Recovers 3% of maximum health per second (increases the value by 1% per allies linked).
(Healing effect can only recover up to 3.6% of Ryan's total attack power per tick)

**[Binding Cross]**
Launches a cross-shaped energy forward dealing 120% of physical attack as damage, cancelling enemies' attacks and silencing them for 2s.
('Binding Cross' has a 12s cooldown and can only receive a maximum of 60% cooldown reduction (12s -> 4.8s))

skill_2.name: Totem
skill_2.description:
Conjures a sacred totem for 10s, pulling nearby enemies towards. Nearby enemies take 30% increased physical damage.

**[Additional Effect]**
If cast while transformed, nearby enemies are dealt up to 120% for the totem duration.

lb_skill_2.description:
Conjures a sacred totem for 10s, pulling nearby enemies towards it and dealing up to 264% physical damage over 10s. If cast while transformed, the damage value is increased from 264% to 408.1%.

Enemies within the damage radius of the totem receive 40% increased physical damage and have their movement speed reduced by 60%.

ultimate.name: Guardian Nephilim
ultimate.description:
Draws out all the inner powers of the warden, dealing 196% physical damage to enemies and instills party members with a strong life force for 10s.
Party members affected by the life force have their damage increased by 30% and heals for 5% of their maximum health per second.
(Healing effect can only recover up to 6% of Ryan's total attack power per tick)

passive.name: The Protector
passive.description: Each time Ronan receives damage from the enemy, for 5 seconds, the basic/skill damage received from enemies will reduce by 5%. When skills are used, for 5 seconds, the basic/skill attack damage received from enemies will reduce by 10%. (Max 40%)

lb_passive.description:
Each time Ronan receives damage from the enemy, for 5 seconds, the basic/skill damage received from enemies will reduce by 5%. When skills are used, for 5 seconds, the basic/skill attack damage received from enemies will reduce by 10%. (Max 40%)

When Ronan is attacked or uses a skill, **'Tempest Blade'** will be summoned for 5 seconds that hovers around him. 1 blade when attacked and 2 blades when using a skill (max 8 blades).
**'Tempest Blade'** will attack surrounding enemies for (50% + 10% per blade) physical damage and reduces enemies's healing received by 5% (max 40%).

skill_1.name: Sword Lancer
skill_1.description: Ronan permanently creates shields for all allies that is 20% of his maximum health. Ronan will then jump into the targeted location with a giant lance and shield to deal 246% of physical attack damage to enemies and for 5 seconds, the magic attack that the enemies receive will increase by 25%.

lb_skill_1.description:
Ronan permanently creates shields for all allies that is 20% of his maximum health. Ronan will then jump into the targeted location with a giant lance and shield to deal 246% of physical attack damage to enemies and for 5 seconds, the magic attack that the enemies receive will increase by 25%.

Enemies attacked by the lance will be inflicted with **'Holy Spear'**. It deals 147.6% additional physical damage and reduces their attack speed by 30% for 7 seconds.

skill_2.name: Magic Defender
skill_2.description:
Instantly dispel harmful effects on allies and for 3 seconds, make them invincible to protect them.
(Ronan's 'Magic Defender' can only receive a maximum of 60% cooldown reduction. (20s -> 8s))

lb_skill_2.description:
Instantly dispel harmful effects on allies and for 3 seconds, make them invincible to protect them.
(Ronan's 'Magic Defender' can only receive a maximum of 60% cooldown reduction. (20s -> 8s))

Furthermore, creates an energy field around Ronan for 5 seconds. Allies within the field’s range have their healing received increased by 40%.

ultimate.name: Tempest Barrier
ultimate.description:
Utilizing the powers of the Tempest, deals 140% physical damage to nearby enemies and protects party members.

**[Protect Effect]**
Party members enter invulnerable state for 3s and are cleansed of negative effects.
Party members deal 30% increased magical damage for 15s.

passive.name: Everyone's Favorite
passive.description: When using basic attacks, 15% chance to absorb a magic bead that recovers 1 SP from an enemy.

lb_passive.description:
When using basic attacks, 15% chance to absorb a magic bead that recovers 1 SP from an enemy.

After using a skill, the chance to acquire a magic bead (SP) is increased to 25%.

skill_1.name: Loving You
skill_1.description: Amy fills the air with love energies that recover allies' health by 249.9% of magic attack and applies the love buff for 10 seconds. Allies with the love buff will have their SP gained increased by 50%. Amy takes 80% reduced damage for 2.3s upon using Loving You.

lb_skill_1.description: Amy fills the air with love energies that recover allies' health by 249.9% of magic attack and applies the love buff for 10 seconds. Allies with the love buff will have their SP gained increased by 50%, and their basic and skill damage dealt by 20%. Amy takes 80% reduced damage for 2.3s upon using Loving You.

skill_2.name: Let's Dance
skill_2.description:
After recovering allies' health by 120% of magic attack through music and dance in the targeted area, increases your allies excitement and create a festival zone for 10 seconds.
Allies within the festival zone will have their basic/skill attack damage received reduced by 15%.

lb_skill_2.description:
After recovering allies' health by 120% of magic attack through music and dance in the targeted area, increases your allies excitement and create a festival zone for 10 seconds.
Allies within the festival zone will have their basic/skill attack damage received reduced by 15%.

After **'Let's Dance'**, **'Holy Dance'** can be used for 0 SP within 5 seconds. **'Holy Dance'** heals the party with 110% of magical attack and creates a shield for the entire party with 20% of each unit's HP for 5 seconds.

ultimate.name: Idol Stage
ultimate.description: Amy draws out excitement with her singing and dancing. Party members recover 23% magical damage as health per second and gain 12 SP over 15s. Furthermore, reduces skill cooldown of all party members by 70% for the buff duration. Idol Stage's effect cannot be dispelled.

passive.name: Burning
passive.description: Jin has a 25% chance to generate a **'Chi'** upon performing a basic attack. **'Chi'** can be stacked up to 10 stacks and an area attack is performed every 5 attacks, allowing for more **'Chi'** generation.

lb_passive.description:
Jin has a 25% chance to generate a **'Chi'** upon performing a basic attack. **'Chi'** can be stacked up to 10 stacks and an area attack is performed every 5 attacks, allowing for more **'Chi'** generation.
If Jin possesses 6 or less **'Chi'** stacks, his basic attacks are enhanced into **'Dragon Squall'**.

**[Dragon Squall]**
Launches a **'Dragon Squall'** upon performing a basic attack, which pierces enemies and deals 46% physical damage. (The following effect cannot be dispelled).

skill_1.name: Iron Mountain Assault
skill_1.description:
Generates shield equivalent to 15% of Jin's maximum health on all party members for 5s, and charges forward dealing 120% physical damage. Generates 2 **'Chi'** on cast and 5% chance to generate an additional **'Chi'** upon striking an enemy.

**[Additional Effect]**
For the next 7s, an additional charge attack can be cast with 0 SP cost. (Maximum of 2 additional casts)

lb_skill_1.description:
Generates shield equivalent to 18% of Jin's maximum health on all party members for 8s, and charges forward dealing 120% physical damage. Struck enemies take 35% increased magical damage for 8s. Generates 2 **'Chi'** on cast and 5% chance to generate an additional **'Chi'** upon striking an enemy.

**[Additional Effect]**
For the next 7s, an additional charge attack can be cast with 0 SP cost. (Maximum of 2 additional casts)

skill_2.name: Stone Immortal
skill_2.description:
Consumes all **'Chi'** and applies **'Stone Immortal'** status on all allies for 15s.

**[Stone Immortal Effect]**
Affected party members take (30% + consumed **'Chi'** amount x 1%) reduced damage and their magic damage is increased by (10% + consumed **'Chi'** x 1%).
A chi bullet is generated every second from all party members with the **'Stone Immortal'** status, which automatically homes towards the enemy with the highest attack power dealing (20% + consumed **'Chi'** x 3%) physical damage in a small area per hit.

lb_skill_2.description:
Consumes all **'Chi'** and applies **'Stone Immortal'** status on all allies for 15s.

**[Stone Immortal Effect]**
Affected party members take (30% + consumed **'Chi'** amount x 1%) reduced damage and their magic damage is increased by (10% + consumed **'Chi'** x 1%).
Removes negative effects from all party members on cast. Gains immunity to all negative status for the duration of **'Stone Immortal'** and the duration of debuffs are reduced by 50% on all party members.
A chi bullet is generated every second from all party members with the **'Stone Immortal'** status, which automatically homes towards the enemy with the highest attack power dealing (20% + consumed **'Chi'** x 3%) physical damage in a small area per hit.

ultimate.name: Flash of Light
ultimate.description:
Flies towards the targeted location and performs a series of rampaging blows, dealing 420% physical damage to all enemies in the area and healing party members for 35.1% of their health. Afterwards, generates 10 **'Chi'** stacks.
(Healing effect can only recover up to 42.12% of Jin's total attack power)

passive.name: Gladiator's Rage
passive.description:
Sieghart will naturally have a shield that is 20% of his maximum HP. When he receives damage and the shield breaks, he will enter Rage state for 20s. (Cooldown: 30s, Rage effects cannot be stacked.)

**[Rage Effect]**
**Rage Activation Effect**
Surrounding enemies have their attack speed reduced by 50% for 8 seconds.
Sieghart's skill cooldowns will reset
Invincible for 3 seconds

**Rage State Effect**
Unaffected by negative statuses
Skill Cooldown reduced by 20%
Damage dealt increased by 30%
Enemies attacked with a basic attack will have their attack speed reduced by 50% for 8 seconds
(Rage state cannot be dispelled.)

lb_passive.description:
Sieghart will naturally have a shield that is 20% of his maximum HP. When he receives damage and the shield breaks, he will enter Rage state for 20s. There is a 10% chance of entering Rage state whenever he uses a skill. (Cooldown: 30s, Rage effects cannot be stacked.)

**[Rage Effect]**
**Rage Activation Effect**
Surrounding enemies have their attack speed reduced by 50% for 8 seconds.
Sieghart's skill cooldowns will reset
Invincible for 3 seconds

**Rage State Effect**
Unaffected by negative statuses
Skill Cooldown reduced by 20%
Damage dealt increased by 50%
Attack Speed increased by 100%
Basic attacks will be changed to deal multiple strikes
Enemies attacked with a basic attack will have their attack speed reduced by 50% for 8 seconds
(Rage state cannot be dispelled.)

skill_1.name: Mortal Impact
skill_1.description:
Sieghart will continuously slash enemies as he spins and charges towards the designated area. While charging, he will create a whirlwind of sword energy that gathers enemies, dealing 246% physical attack damage

**[Additional Effect]**
Enemies attacked will have their damage dealt reduced by 30% for 8 seconds.

lb_skill_1.description:
Sieghart will continuously slash enemies as he spins and charges towards the designated area. While charging, he will create a whirlwind of sword energy that gathers enemies, dealing 246% physical attack damage, and at the end he will perform a large slash, pushing enemies and dealing 120% physical attack damage.
Enemies attacked will have their damage dealt reduced by 30% for 8 seconds, and their movement speed reduced by 70% for 3 seconds.
When Sieghart uses **'[Enhanced] Mortal Impact'**, party members will be granted with **'Seething Rage'** that lasts for 10 seconds.

**[Seething Rage Effect]**
The first skill used by a party member will be Maximized, and **'Seething Rage'** will be removed from all party members. 
(Seething Rage can only be applied to Heroes, and cannot be dispelled Cooldown: 30 seconds)

skill_2.name: Grinding Punisher
skill_2.description: Swiftly charge in the designated direction and slash at enemies, dealing 120% physical attack damage, cancelling enemy attacks, and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

lb_skill_2.description:
Swiftly charge in the designated direction and slash at enemies, dealing 120% physical attack damage, cancelling enemy attacks, and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 5 seconds.
If the skill lands a critical, the skill can be used once more with 0 SP within 5 seconds. (The skill can only be reused for a maximum of 3 times if consecutive criticals strike.)

ultimate.name: Flash of Rage
ultimate.description: Unleashes all the rage within, dealing 279.9% physical damage to all enemies in rage. Afterwards, enters Rage state for 20s.

passive.name: Overload
passive.description: Each basic and skill attack has a 10% chance to inflict **'Overload'** status to the enemy for 5s. Attacking enemies with **'Overload'** with a basic attack will spread **'Overload'** to a maximum of 5 other enemies, and explode dealing 25% magic damage.

lb_passive.description:
Mari gains 1% basic and skill damage dealt per basic attack. The buff lasts for 7 seconds, and can be stacked for a maximum of 20%. (This buff cannot be dispelled)
Each basic and skill attack has a 10% chance to inflict **'Overload'** status to the enemy for 5s. Attacking enemies with **'Overload'** with a basic attack will spread **'Overload'** to a maximum of 8 other enemies, and explode dealing 25% magic damage.

skill_1.name: Summon the Support
skill_1.description:
**'KORMET'** drops from the sky dealing 120% magic damage to enemies in the area. **'KORMET'** will remain to fight for 30 seconds.

**[Additional Effect]**
KORMET fires guided missiles to the struck targets, dealing 72% magic damage.
When KORMET expires, it will pull in nearby enemies before exploding, dealing 180% magic damage.

lb_skill_1.description:
Enhanced **'KORMET'** drops from the sky dealing 200% magic damage to enemies in the area. Enhanced **'KORMET'** will remain to fight for 30 seconds. (Up to a maximum of 4 'KORMETs' can be summoned at a time.)

**[Enhanced KORMET Ability]**
**'KORMET'** will emit shockwaves dealing 70% magic damage to enemies surrounding it attack surrounding enemies with maximum of 15 laser missiles, dealing 85% magic damage to an area.
When KORMET expires, it will pull in nearby enemies before exploding, dealing 180% magic damage.

skill_2.name: Final Decision
skill_2.description: Mari launches WDW to the specified location that will emit high energy electrons for 15 seconds. Enemies in the location will receive 358.4% magic damage over time, and the first 4 enemies will be inflicted with **'Overload'**. KORMETs will be affected by the high energy electrons, attacking twice as fast, and recovering HP over time.

lb_skill_2.description:
Mari launches WDW to the specified location that will emit high energy electrons for 5 seconds. Enemies in the location will receive 358.8% magic damage over time, and the first 4 enemies will be inflicted with **'Overload'**. Thereafter, there is a 50% chance that enemies will be inflicted with **'Overload'**. Enemies killed within **'Final Decision'** will reduce the skill's remaining cooldown by 5%.
KORMETs will be affected by the high energy electrons, increasing their damage dealt by 20%, attacking twice as fast, and recovering HP over time.

ultimate.name: Eraser
ultimate.description: Mari designates a laser strike utilizing her satellite in the stratosphere. Calls down a powerful laser beam to deal 727.8% magical damage.

passive.name: Devil Force
passive.description:
Enemies around Dio will take 20% increased magic damage.
On every 7th basic attack, he rotates his 'Death Star' around him, dealing 47% physical damage. Among the struck enemies, 1 target with the most health will have its buffs dispelled and inflicted with silence for 5s.

skill_1.name: Onrush
skill_1.description: Summons a large lance and pushes away enemies, dealing 120% physical damage. Afterwards, causes a large explosion that deals 120% physical damage. Among the struck enemies, 1 target the most health will have its buffs dispelled and inflicted with silence for 5s. Struck enemies are inflicted with **'Latent Fear'** for 5s. Enemies inflicted with **'Latent Fear'** have a 20% chance to be inflicted with silence and have their buffs dispelled whenever Dio hits them with a basic attack.

skill_2.name: Death Sign
skill_2.description: Summons a large hand that slams down on the designated point, dealing 246% physical damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for 3s.

ultimate.name: Innocent Fear
ultimate.description:
Using his authority, Dio forces all enemies in range to kneel before him, dealing 280% physical damage and stunning them for 8s.
Additionally, party members have their magic damage increased by 20% for 10s.

passive.name: Increase
passive.description:
Whenever a skill attack results in a critical hit, Zero's maximum health is increased by 1%, up to a maximum of 80% and immediately recovers 2% health. (Healing effect can only recover up to 2.4% of Zero's total attack power and the maximum health increase effect cannot be dispelled.)

Whenever a basic attack results in a critical hit, Zero's remaining cooldowns are reduced by 40% and party members take 30% reduced damage for 5s.

skill_1.name: Gran X
skill_1.description:
Generates shield equivalent to 25% of Zero's maximum health on all party members for 5s before attacking enemies, dealing 246% physical damage to them, along with cancelling their attacks and inflicting silence for 3s.
For the next 5s, **'Grandark's Domination'** can be cast once on an ally with 0 SP cost.

**[Grandark's Domination]**
Enhances both Zero's and the targeted party member by extending Grandark's control.
Immunity to negative status
Generates shield equivalent to 20% of Zero's maximum health
Attack speed and skill damage increased by 20%
('Grandark's Domination' effect cannot be dispelled.)

skill_2.name: Prickle Gash
skill_2.description: Generates shield equivalent to 30% of Zero's maximum health on himself for 7s before throwing Grandark to the designated point, dealing 120% physical damage. Struck enemies are inflicted with provoke for 8s and struck summoned units are immediately removed. (Prioritizes targeting summoned units in auto battle mode)

ultimate.name: Dimensional Fissure
ultimate.description: Conjures a dimensional fissure with the powers of Grandark, pulling nearby enemies into it and dealing 560% physical damage. Struck enemies take 30% increased damage for 15s.

passive.name: Demonic Resonance
passive.description:
When Ley's summons are present, sealed power from the demon world empowers Ley and strengthens her basic attacks.
Ley's enhanced basic attack will explode upon contact with an enemy, dealing 35% magic damage to surrounding enemies. Each basic attack will also strengthen summons on the field.

**[Summon Enhancement Effect]**
Heal 2% of HP (Maximum amount of HP healed is capped at 2.4% of Ley's TAP)
Summons have their skill's remaining cooldowns reduced by 1 second
Damage dealt increased by 2% (Max 50%)

lb_passive.description:
When Ley's summons are present, sealed power from the demon world empowers Ley and strengthens her basic attacks.
Ley's enhanced basic attack will explode upon contact with an enemy, dealing 35% magic damage to surrounding enemies. Each basic attack will also strengthen summons on the field.
When there are 3 or more of Ley's summons on the field, **'Firebird Splash'** will be activated.

**[Summon Enhancement Effect]**
Heal 2% of HP (Maximum amount of HP healed is capped at 2.4% of Ley's TAP)
Summons have their skill's remaining cooldowns reduced by 1 second
Damage dealt increased by 2% (Max 50%)

**[Firebird Splash]**
**'Firebird Splash'** will manifest around Ley, and targets the enemy with the highest attack. 2 Firebirds will be fired per second, dealing 86% magic damage to the area.
(Cannot be dispelled)

skill_1.name: Jeeves~
skill_1.description:
Summons **'Jeeves'** for 30s at the designated point, dealing 246% magical damage. Once **'Jeeves'** is summoned, 'Go! Jeeves' can be used. **'Jeeves'** cannot be resummoned while he is summoned.

**[Go! Jeeves]**
Commands **'Jeeves'** to charge towards the designated point, pushing along all enemies in his path and dealing 239.8% of **'Jeeves'** magical damage. (Cooldown 3s)

lb_skill_1.name: Garouille
lb_skill_1.description:
Summon **'Garouille'** instead of **'Jeeves'** at the designated location for 30 seconds, dealing 246% magic damage upon summon. **'Garouille'** is able to use 'Break Through' while it is summoned. **'Garouille'** cannot be resummoned while on the field, and will be unable to receive negative statuses for 5 seconds when summoned.

**[Break Through]**
**'Garouille'** will charge in the designated direction, pushing and dealing 240.3% of **'Garouille's'** magic damage. (Cooldown: 3s)

**[Garouille Breath]**
Every 7 seconds, **'Garouille'** will fire a breath at the enemy with the highest attack, dealing 240% of **'Garouille's'** magic attack at the area. Enemies attacked will receive 10 hits over 3 seconds, and there is a 10% chance per hit that the enemy will be petrified for 2 seconds.

skill_2.name: Pursue! Haunt
skill_2.description: **'Haunt'** is summoned at the designated area for 30 seconds, and deals 108% magic damage upon summon. **'Haunt'** will track the nearest enemy, deal 110% of **'Haunt's'** magic attack per second and reduce their healing received by 50% to surrounding enemies. (Up to 3 Haunts can be summoned at a time.)

lb_skill_2.description:
**'Haunt'** is summoned at the designated area for 30 seconds, and deals 108% magic damage upon summon. **'Haunt'** will track the nearest enemy, deal 110% of **'Haunt's'** magic attack per second and reduce their healing received by 50% to surrounding enemies. (Up to 3 Haunts can be summoned at a time.)
When 2 **'Haunt'** have been summoned, **'Hate'** can be summoned with 'Targeting On' with 0 SP within 6 seconds.

**[Targeting On]**
Summon the Tracer of Hate, **'Hate'** at the designated location for 30 seconds, drawing in enemies, dispelling enemy shields and dealing 96% magic damage.
**'Hate'** will constantly fire dark orbs with piercing capabilities at enemies, dealing 93% of 'Hate's' magic attack. Every 6 seconds, it will teleport to the enemy with the highest attack and draw them in, dealing 324% of **'Hate's'** magic attack and dispelling their shields.
(Up to 2 'Hates' can be summoned at a time.)

ultimate.name: Center of Gravity
ultimate.description: Conjures a miniature black hole at the designated point. The black hole pulls in all enemies in range before exploding, dealing 644% magical damage.

passive.name: Wolf's Seal
passive.description:
10% chance to apply **'Wolf's Seal'** debuff on enemies for 5s upon attacking. Enemies marked by the seal receive 1.5x damage from Rufus and have their health recovery reduced by 35%.
Furthermore, bullets will ricochet up to 7 marked enemies in range upon basic attack.

lb_passive.description:
10% chance to apply **'Wolf's Seal'** debuff on enemies for 5s upon attacking. Enemies marked by the seal receive 1.5x damage from Rufus, have their health recovery reduced by 35% and deal 25% reduced damage to Rufus.
Furthermore, bullets will ricochet up to 7 marked enemies in range upon basic attack.

'Enhanced Wolf's Seal' cannot be cleansed.

skill_1.name: Final Shot
skill_1.description: Focuses all his powers into the Eyeteeth and fires a powerful shot towards the designated point, dealing 120% physical damage and marks enemies with **'Wolf's Seal'**.

lb_skill_1.description:
Focuses all his powers into the Eyeteeth and fires a powerful shot towards the designated point, dealing 120% physical damage and increases the critical rate of allies by 15% for 12s.
Struck enemies are marked with **'Wolf's Seal'**.

Struck enemies take 30% increased basic attack damage for 5s.

skill_2.name: Make It Rain
skill_2.description: Rains down a barrage of bullets at the designated area, dealing 196.8% physical damage to the enemies and reduces their movement speed by 60% for 5s.

lb_skill_2.description:
Rains down a barrage of bullets at the designated area, dealing 203.9% physical damage to the enemies and reduces their movement speed by 60% for 5s.

Struck enemies take 20% physical damage per second for 5s.

ultimate.name: Expunge
ultimate.description: Rains down a barrage of shots with numerous weapons at the designated point, dealing 447.6% physical damage to all enemies in the area.

passive.name: Light and Darkness
passive.description:
Whenever Rin uses an active skill, she will acquire 1 **'Glyph'**, and when she acquires 4 **'Glyphs'**, depending on the next skill used, she will transform into **'Light Rin'** or **'Dark Rin'** for 20 seconds.
('Glyph', 'Light Rin' and 'Dark Rin' cannot be dispelled. While transformed, Rin is unable to acquire 'Glyphs'.)

**[Light Rin Effect]**
If a critical attack occurs from either basic attack or skill, heal allies by 50% of magic attack (1 second cooldown)
Immune to all negative status.

**[Dark Rin Effect]**
If a critical attack occurs from either basic attack or skill, decrease the remaining allies' skill cooldown instantly by 8% (1 second cooldown)
Immune to all negative status.

lb_passive.description:
Whenever Rin uses an active skill, she will acquire 1 **'Glyph'**, and when she acquires 4 **'Glyphs'**, depending on the next skill used, she will transform into **'Light Rin'** or **'Dark Rin'** for 20 seconds.
When Rin transforms, her critical rate will be increased by 20%, and when the transformation expires, there is a 50% chance of acquiring 1 **'Glyph'**.
('Glyph', 'Light Rin', 'Dark Rin' and the critical buff cannot be dispelled. While transformed, Rin is unable to acquire 'Glyphs'.)

**[Light Rin Effect]**
If a critical attack occurs from either basic attack or skill, heal allies by 50% of magic attack (1 second cooldown)
Immune to all negative status.

**[Dark Rin Effect]**
If a critical attack occurs from either basic attack or skill, decrease the remaining allies' skill cooldown instantly by 8% (1 second cooldown)
Immune to all negative status.

skill_1.name: Flash of Light
skill_1.description:
Using the power of light, restore HP to party members with 233.7% of magic attack power and acquire 1 **'Glyph'**.

**[Light Rin Additional Effect]**
Rin will heal the party with 295.2% of magic attack power.

**[Dark Rin Additional Effect]**
A dark explosion will be set off from party members dealing 20% magic damage and dispelling surrounding enemies' buffs. Allies will be healed by 40% of magic attack power when a buff is dispelled. (2s cooldown)

lb_skill_1.description:
Using the power of light, restore HP to party members with 233.7% of magic attack power and acquire 1 **'Glyph'**.
When **'Flash of Light'** does a critical, Rin can use **'Raging Wind'** with 0 SP within the next 5 seconds.
**'Raging Wind'** grants the party a 20% increase in magic damage dealt, and continuously heals them for 20% of magic attack power per second for 7s. Rin will acquire 1 **'Glyph'**. (Rin will not transform by using this skill)

**[Light Rin Additional Effect]**
Rin will heal the party with 295.2% of magic attack power.
When using **'Raging Wind'**, the party will be healed for 35% of magic attack power per second for 7s.

**[Dark Rin Additional Effect]**
A dark explosion will be set off from party members dealing 20% magic damage and dispelling surrounding enemies' buffs. Allies will be healed by 40% of magic attack power when a buff is dispelled. (2s cooldown)
When using **'Raging Wind'**, the party will be granted a 30% increase in magic damage dealt for 7s.

skill_2.name: Inner Fire
skill_2.description:
Using the power of darkness, create flames in a designated area and acquire 1 **'Glyph'**.
Enemies within the flames are attacked per second for 5 seconds, dealing 120^% damage over time, and have their buffs dispelled. Allies will be healed by 40% of magic attack power when a buff is dispelled. (There is a 2 second cooldown.)

**[Light Rin Additional Effect]**
Party members will be healed with 80% of magic attack power.

**[Dark Rin Additional Effect]**
The area of flames will be 50% larger and lasts for 8 seconds.

lb_skill_2.description:
Using the power of darkness, create flames in a designated area and acquire 1 **'Glyph'**.
Enemies within the flames are attacked twice per second for 5 seconds, dealing 119.9% damage over time, and have their buffs dispelled. Allies will be healed by 40% of magic attack power when a buff is dispelled. (There is a 2 second cooldown.)
When **'Inner Fire'** deals a critical, the enemy that is dealt with the critical will receive 20% more magic damage for 7 seconds.

**[Light Rin Additional Effect]**
Party members will be healed with 80% of magic attack power.

**[Dark Rin Additional Effect]**
The area of flames will be 50% larger and lasts for 8 seconds.

ultimate.name: Unstoppable Power
ultimate.description:
Conjures a storm of power with concentrated powers of light and darkness, dealing 280% magical damage to all enemies in range.
At the same time, heals allies for 224% magical attack. Generates shield equivalent to 35% of Rin's maximum health on all party members for 10s and heals them for 30% magical attack per second

passive.name: Blue Fox's Aura
passive.description:
When Asin acquires 4 power of water stacks, 1 SP is recovered and party members are applied with **'Blue Fox's Aura'** status. A **'Blue Orb'** is generated every 2 seconds from all party members with **'Blue Fox's Aura'** status, which automatically homes towards nearby enemies dealing 135% physical damage.

**[Power of Water Acquisition Condition]**
- Acquires a stack on skill cast (only first cast for Pressure Point)
- 10% chance to acquire a stack on basic attack

skill_1.name: Pressure Point
skill_1.description:
Generates shield equivalent to 20% of Asin's maximum health on all party members for 7s and charges forward, dealing 120% physical damage and inflicts enemies with **'Demonic Scar'** for 7s.
Enemies inflicted with **'Demonic Scar'** take 10% increased damage. (Max 3 Demonic Scar stacks)

**[Additional Effect]**
For the next 7s, up to 2 additional charge attacks can be cast with 0 SP cost.

skill_2.name: Fire Drop
skill_2.description:
Charges towards enemies, dealing 300% physical damage. Struck enemies have their damage reduced by 50% for 20s.

Enemies inflicted with **'Demonic Scar'** have their damage further reduced, depending on the number of **'Demonic Scar'** stacks. (1 stack: 6%, 2 stacks: 12%, 3 stacks: 20%)

ultimate.name: King's Wrath
ultimate.description: Generates shield equivalent to 40% of Asin's maximum health on all party members for 10s before conjuring pillars of water at the designated point, dealing 476% physical damage. Struck enemies are inflicted with 3 **'Demonic Scar'** stacks, causing them to take 30% increased damage and their damage is reduced by 70% for 20s.

passive.name: Oracle
passive.description:
Lime has a 10% chance to heal party members for 30% magical attack on basic attack.
Furthermore, her basic attack changes to a close range area attack when an enemy is nearby. In this state, Lime has a 20% chance per target (max 5 targets) to heal party members for 30% magical attack.

Grants invulnerable state to a party member that is on the brink of death for 5s and recovers 30% of their health. (60s cooldown)
(Healing effect can only recover up to 7.2% of Lime's total attack power)

skill_1.name: Bless
skill_1.description:
Immediately heals party members for 110% magical attack. For the next 5s, a charging attack **'Holy Smash'** can be cast with 0 SP cost.

**[Holy Smash]**
Lunges towards the designated point, generating shockwaves that deal 120% magical damage to enemies in the area. Struck enemies take 25% increased magical damage for 5s. Heals party members based on the number of struck enemies (magical attack 20% x number of targets, max 100%) and generates shield equivalent to 30% of Lime's maximum health on party members in the shockwave area for 5s.

skill_2.name: Glory
skill_2.description: Immediately heals party members for 120% magical attack and blesses them with sacred powers, continuously cleansing all negative effects for 3s. The following effect cannot be dispelled.

ultimate.name: Liberation
ultimate.description:
Drops a gigantic hammer at the designated point, dealing 280% magical damage and healing party members for 50% of their health. (Healing effect can only recover up to 60% of Lime's total attack power)
Afterwards, party members are continuously cleansed of all negative effects for 8s. The following effect cannot be dispelled.

passive.name: Flintlock
passive.description:
For every 7 attacks, fire a shot with the **'Flintlock'** for 267% physical damage. Enemies attacked by the shot will be inflicted with **'Armor Break'** status for 3s.

**[Armor Break Status]**
Increases damage received by 30%.
Slowly recover from 70% decrease in movement speed.

skill_1.name: Frenzy Sprint
skill_1.description: Charge and stab with 384% of physical attack. Enemies that were attacked have their HP recovery reduced by 60% for 8 seconds. If the last stab hits more than 4 enemies, this skill can be used 1 more time with 0 SP within 5 seconds.

skill_2.name: Lunatic Blade
skill_2.description:
Launches sword energy to push enemies with 303.5% of physical attack, inflicting **'Armor Break'** for 7 seconds.

**[Armor Break Status]**
Increases damage received by 30%.
Slowly recover from 70% decrease in movement speed.

ultimate.name: Moon Slash
ultimate.description:
With the moon's energy, cut your enemies with 478% of physical attack, inflicting them with **'Armor Break'** for 15 seconds.

**[Armor Break Status]**
Increases damage received by 50%.
Slowly recover from 70% decrease in movement speed.

passive.name: Dark Fury
passive.description: Whenever Veigas casts a skill, his skill damage increases by 2% up to a maximum of 20%. (The following effect cannot be dispelled.)

skill_1.name: Dark Hole
skill_1.description: Conjures and launches up to 12 **'Dark Hole'** based on the number of enemies in the designated area, dealing 78% magical damage per **'Dark Hole'**. Each **'Dark Hole'** remains on the field for 8s. Afterwards, **'Distortion'** can be cast with 0 SP cost while **'Dark Hole'** remains. **'Distortion'** immediately causes all **'Dark Hole'** to explode, dealing 64% magical damage per **'Dark Hole'**.

skill_2.name: Dark Frenzy
skill_2.description: Stuns a single target for 3s and conjures a dimensional rift. The rift strongly pulls all enemies in range towards the stunned target before exploding, dealing 120% magical damage. Furthermore, all **'Dark Hole'** in range translocate themselves towards the dimensional rift, dealing additional 28% magical damage per **'Black Hole'** and extends their duration by 3s.

ultimate.name: Dark Spear
ultimate.description: Conjures a seemingly endless stream of dark spears from the sky, raining them down upon the designated area dealing 1,344.3% magical damage.

passive.name: Pure Passion
passive.description:
Serdin's basic attack is enhanced for 20s whenever she casts a skill. The following effect cannot be dispelled.

**[Enhanced Basic Attack Effect]**
Single target attack changed to multi-target attack
Damage increased by 200% (stacks with basic attack damage increase effect)

lb_passive.description:
Serdin's basic attack is enhanced for 20s whenever she casts a skill. The following effect cannot be dispelled.

**[Enhanced Basic Attack Effect]**
Single target attack changed to multi-target attack
Damage increased by 300% (stacks with basic attack damage increase effect)
Upon 5 enhanced basic attacks, generates shield equivalent to 10% of the party members' maximum health on all party members for 5s.

skill_1.name: Intermediate Magic: Gust
skill_1.description: Conjures a gust of wind in the designated area for 5s, dealing 120% magical damage to enemies in the area and inflicts them with **'Weakened State'** for 8s. Enemies inflicted with **'Weakened State'** take 30% increased basic attack damage and whenever Serdin performs a basic attack on an enemy with **'Weakened State'**, party members are healed for 8% magical attack x number of targets (max 7).

lb_skill_1.description:
Conjures a gust of wind in the designated area for 5s, dealing 120% magical damage to enemies in the area and inflicts them with **'Weakened State'** for 8s. Enemies inflicted with **'Weakened State'** take 30% increased basic attack damage and whenever Serdin performs a basic attack on an enemy with **'Weakened State'**, party members are healed for 8% magical attack x number of targets (max 7).

For the next 5 seconds, **'Intermediate Magic: Strengthen'** can be cast once with 0 SP cost.

**[Intermediate Magic: Strengthen]**
Deals 120% magical damage to all enemies in the area. Struck enemies have their basic attack damage reduced by 30% for 7s and allies have their basic attack damage increased by 80% for 7s.

skill_2.name: Intermediate Magic: Protect
skill_2.description: Generates shield equivalent to 20% of Serdin's maximum health on all party members for 8s and immediately heals them for 246% magical attack.

lb_skill_2.description:
Generates shield equivalent to 20% of Serdin's maximum health on all party members for 8s and immediately heals them for 246% magical attack.

Whenever the shield is removed or its duration ends, party members receive a buff that reduces skill damage taken by 50% and heals for 50% magical attack per second for 5s. This effect cannot be dispelled.

ultimate.name: Advanced Magic: Salvation
ultimate.description: Generates shield equivalent to 40% of Serdin's maximum health on all party members for 10s and immediately heals them for 420% magical attack. Furthermore, party members have their basic attack damage increased by 30% for 10s.

passive.name: The Godlike
passive.description:
Kanavan generates a **'Sword Boundary'** around her at all times. Enemies within the boundary have 1 **'Sword Energy'** stack applied every second and receive 30% increased physical damage.

35% chance to apply a **Sword Energy** stack upon basic attack.
**Sword Energy** lasts for 8s duration and 250% physical damage is dealt upon reaching 4 stacks.

lb_passive.description:
Kanavan generates a **'Sword Boundary'** around her at all times. Enemies within the boundary have 1 **'Sword Energy'** stack applied every second and receive 30% increased physical damage.

35% chance to apply a **Sword Energy** stack upon basic attack.
**Sword Energy** lasts for 8s duration and 250% physical damage is dealt upon reaching 4 stacks.

Upon eliminating an enemy, all allies have their physical/magical damage increased by 30% for 10s.

skill_1.name: Sword Charging
skill_1.description: Charges towards the designated point, dealing 159.6% physical damage and applies 1 **Sword Energy** stack on all struck enemies. Afterwards, an additional charge attack can be cast with 0 SP cost.

lb_skill_1.description: Charges towards the designated point, dealing 360% physical damage and applies 3 **Sword Energy** stack on all struck enemies. Generates shield equivalent to 25% of Kanavan's maximum health on herself for 5s.

skill_2.name: Sweep
skill_2.description: Swings her sword, dealing 360% physical damage to all enemies in range and applies 2 **Sword Energy** stacks.

lb_skill_2.description:
Swings her sword, dealing 360% physical damage to all enemies in range and applies 2 **Sword Energy** stacks. Furthermore, deals additional 216% damage to a maximum of 2 enemies in range and applies 1 additional **Sword Energy** stack to the struck enemies.

All struck enemies have their movement speed reduced by 50% for 5s. There is a 10% chance to reduce their movement speed by 100% for 5s instead.

ultimate.name: Sword Storm
ultimate.description: Rushes towards the designated point and unleashes a flurry of slashes, dealing 1,287.9% physical damage to all enemies in the area and applies 3 **Sword Energy**.

passive.name: Skyliner
passive.description:
When specific conditions are met, Werner will create **'Skyliner'** which surrounds him. ('Skyliner' cannot be dispelled.)

**['Skyliner' Creation Condition]**
Every 10 criticals will create 1 stack.
When Skill Maximization occurs, 80 stacks will be created.
A maximum of 100 **'Skyliner'** stacks can be created.

**['Skyliner' Effect]**
Each stack of **'Skyliner'** will increase Werner's Physical Attack by 1%. When there are enemies nearby, 2 **'Skyliner'** will be launched for a piercing attack every second. Each **'Skyliner'** deals 42% physical damage. (The number of 'Skyliner' stacks will decrease)

skill_1.name: Death Impact
skill_1.description:
Swords are summoned from the sky in row and are then dropped, dealing 240% of physical damage to enemies and pushing them.
5 stacks of **'Skyliner'** are created after the attack.

skill_2.name: Death Storm
skill_2.description:
Numerous swords are launched at a large area, dealing 37% of physical damage to enemies. The swords will then fly about for 5 seconds, dealing 245.7% of physical damage to enemies.
8 stacks of **'Skyliner'** are created after the attack.

ultimate.name: Death Stage
ultimate.description:
A large sword is summoned from the sky and then crashes to the ground. It then splits into countless swords dealing 560% of physical attack to enemies.
40 stacks of **'Skyliner'** are created after the attack.

passive.name: Time Regression
passive.description:
Grants invulnerable state to a party member that is on the brink of death for 5s and recovers 60% of their health. The affected party member is rendered immobile for the duration of the invulnerability. (Cooldown 60s)
(Healing effect can only recover up to 12% of Grandiel's total attack power)

skill_1.name: Rapid Recovery
skill_1.description:
Heals party members for 246% magical attack and increases their skill damage by 30% for 8s.

For the next 5s, Healing Magic Circle can be cast with 0 SP cost.

Healing Magic Circle heals party members for 70% magical attack and generates shield equivalent to 30% of Grandiel's maximum HP on all Healing Orbs for 5s.

skill_2.name: Healing Orb
skill_2.description:
Summons a orb that follows the party and heals nearby party members. The party members in range of the Healing Orb are healed for 30% magical attack per second. Additionally, there is a 10% chance to recover 1 SP every second. Healing Orbs are not able to heal other Healing Orbs.

Healing Orbs takes 5% of their maximum health as damage whenever they heal a party member. 

Whenever a Healing Orb is destroyed, party members are healed for 80% magical attack. A maximum of 2 Healing Orbs can be summoned at a time.

ultimate.name: Time Distortion
ultimate.description:
Immediately heals party members for 560% magical attack and applies the following buff effect for 20s.

**[Time Distortion Effect]**
- Basic attack speed increased by 70%
- Movement speed increased by 70%
- Skill casting time reduced by 100%
- Skill cooldown reduced by 20% every second
- Healing Orb SP recovery chance increased to 20%

special.name: Master of Darkness
special.description: If Corrupted Gaian is included in the party for dual raid stages **'Fire and Ice'** or **'New World'**, party members have their damage increased by 20%.

passive.name: Touch of Corruption
passive.description: Whenever enemies are damaged by corrupted Gaian, they are inflicted with **'Touch of Corruption'**. Enemies inflicted with **'Touch of Corruption'** take 1% increased damage from corrupted Gaian per stack, up to a maximum of 20%.

skill_1.name: Corrupted Sand Hell
skill_1.description: Gathers all enemies in range towards the designated point, dealing 138% magical damage and immobilizing them for 3s. Struck enemies are inflicted with 5 stacks of **'Touch of Corruption'**.

skill_2.name: Corrupted Hand of Anubis
skill_2.description: Conjures 6 dark hands on the designated point, which then spread outwards in 6 directions. Each hand deals 152% magical damage and struck enemies are inflicted with 2 stacks of **'Touch of Corruption'** per hand.

ultimate.name: Corrupted Anubis' Madness
ultimate.description: Conjures countless dark hands that pushes enemies towards the designated direction, dealing 560.1% magical damage. Struck enemies have their movement speed reduced by 80% for 2s and are inflicted with 3 stacks of **'Touch of Corruption'**.

special.name: Gold Rush
special.description: If Arsad is included in the party for a dimensional beast battle, gains 20% of the obtained based gold as additional gold.

passive.name: Demonic Release
passive.description: Whenever Arsad casts a skill, party members have their damage increased by 25% for 10s.

skill_1.name: Rolling Sword Rush
skill_1.description: Generates shield equivalent to 20% of Arsad's maximum health on all party members for 8s before charging forward with a rotating spin, dragging along nearby enemies and dealing 120% physical damage. Upon reaching the designated point, Arsad brandishes his sword, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing 120% physical damage. Struck enemies are immobilized for 3s.

skill_2.name: Celestial Shield
skill_2.description:
Generates shield equivalent to 20% of Arsad's maximum health on all party members for 8s before conjuring a celestial shield that pushes enemies back, dealing 120% physical damage.
After which, the shield continuously travels forward for 5s before disappearing, dealing up to 120% physical damage.

ultimate.name: Commence Bombardment
ultimate.description: Generates shield equivalent to 30% of Arsad's maximum health on all party members for 10s before shelling enemies with various pyro and cryo rounds, dealing 280% physical damage. After which, Arsad fires a penetrating round, dealing 280% physical damage and pushes enemies away before reducing their movement speed by 70% for 3s.
